form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION TO EXTEND TIME OF TEMPORARY STAY IN THE UNITED STATES, 4-3-R0068

full_text: UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE READ BY NARA 2810/2023F ULLY Form approved IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE FEE WILL NOT BE REFUNDED. OMB No. R0068 30 FEE STAMP APPLICATION TO EXTEND $. 10- FEEPAID No. POO- 74 10-7 JUL 16 TIME OF TEMPORARY STAY Immigration and Naturalization Service I HEREBY APPLY TO EXTEND MY Portland, Cregon M & F 73 TEMPORARY STAY IN THE UNITED STATES Date 7-16-73 Verified by BMB. PRINT OR TYPE YOUR NAME EXACTLY 6. DATE TO WHICH EXTENSION IS REQUESTED AS IT APPEARS ON YOUR ARRIVAL - DEPARTURE RECORD FORM 1-94 January 1974 1. YOUR FAMILY NAME (Capital Letters) FIRST MIDDLE 7. REASON FOR REQUESTING EXTENSION: NAME Nguyen Nhat Thi Visit Children 2. MAILING NUMBER AND STREET FILE NUMBER ADDRESS IN U.S. 2173 W. 16th Ave. A19 790 690 CITY STATE ZIP CODE Eugene, Oregon 97402 3. DATE OF BIRTH (Month, Day, Year) COUNTRY OF BIRTH COUNTRY OF CITIZENSHIP 8. REASON FOR COMING TO THE U.S.: 1906 VietNam VietNam 4. PRESENT NONIMMIGRANT CLASSIFICATION DATE ON WHICH AUTHORIZED STAY EXPIRES B/2 July 17, 1973 Visit Children 5. DATE AND PORT OF LAST ARRIVAL IN UNITED STATES NAME OF VESSEL, AIRLINE, OR OTHER MEANS OF LAST ARRIVAL IN U.S. Dec. 17, 69, Honolulu, HA PA 842 9. HAS AN IMMIGRANT VISA PETITION EVER BEEN FILED IN YOUR BEHALF? YES NO IF "YES", WHERE WAS IT FILED? FOR GOVERNMENT USE ONLY My 10. HAVE YOU EVER APPLIED FOR AN IMMIGRANT VISA OR PERMANENT RESIDENCE IN THE U.S.? YES NO IF "YES", WHERE DID YOU APPLY? EXTENSION GRANTED TO (Date) DATE OF ACTION July 19, 1973 January 17, 1974 11. INTEND TO DEPART FROM THE U.S. ON Jan. 1974 AM IN POSSESSION OF A TRANSPORTATION TICKET FOR MY DEPARTURE EXTENSION DENIED V.D. TO (Date) YES NO DD 12. PASSPORT NO. * EXPIRES ON (DATE) ISSUED BY (COUNTRY) OR OIC OFFICE Portland, Oregon 020124/69 Dec. 74 VietNam 13. Number, Street, City, Province (State) and Country of Permanent Residence 14. MY USUAL OCCUPATION IS: 15. SOCIAL SECURITY No. (If none, state "none") 177/2 Le Van Duyet, Saigon, VietNam Housewife NONE 16. AM AM NOT married. If you wish to apply for extension for your spouse and children, give the following: (See Instruction # 1) NAME OF SPOUSE AND CHILDREN DATE OF BIRTH COUNTRY OF BIRTH PASSPORT ISSUED BY (Country) AND EXPIRES ON (Date) NOTE: If spouse and children for whom you are seeking extension do not reside with you, give their complete address on 0 seporate attachment to this application. 17. (Insert "Have" or "Have Not") Have Not BEEN EMPLOYED OR ENGAGED IN BUSINESS IN THE UNITED STATES. IF YOU HAVE BEEN EMPLOYED OR ENGAGED IN BUSINESS IN THE UNITED STATES, COMPLETE THE REST OF THE BLOCK. NAME AND ADDRESS OF EMPLOYER OR BUSINESS INCOME PER WEEK DATES EMPLOYMENT OR BUSINESS BEGAN AND ENDED N/A 18. IF YOU ARE A TEMPORARY VISITOR FOR PLEASURE (B-2), SEE INSTRUCTION 6 AND COMPLETE THIS BLOCK BY FILLING IN SPACES AND PLACING AN "X" IN THE APPROPRIATE BOXES. I HAVE ,000 OLLARS IN THE UNITED STATES. I RECEIVE DOLLARS EACH FROM , (Week, Month) (Name) (Relationship) (Address) MY ROOM AND BOARD IN THE U.S. ARE SUPPLIED BY MYSELF BY Mr. & Mrs. (Name) James McGeever, Daughter & Son- n-law, 2173 W. 16th Ave. Eugene, Oregon (Relationship) HAVE DO NOT HAVE A FAMILY ABROAD DEPENDENT UPON ME (Address) FOR SUPPORT. IF YOU CHECKED "HAVE" STATE HOW YOUR FAMILY IS BEING SUPPORTED: I certify that the above is true and correct. SIGNATURE OF APPLICANT DATE July 13, 1973 SIGNATURE OF PERSON PREPARING FORM, IF OTHER THAN APPLICANT I declare that this document was prepared by me at the request of the applicant and is based on all information of which I have any knowledge. SIGNATURE ADDRESS DATE Dieeexum Mcgever 2173 W. 16th Ave., Eugene, Oregon July 13, 1973 ATTACH YOUR FORM 1-94 OR SW-434-*D0 NOT SEND YOUR PASSPORT RECEIVED TRANS. IN RET'D.-TRANS. OUT COMPLETED FORM 1-539 (REV. 8-1-72) N JUL 19 1973 7/19/73
